attributes.action: EU referendum politicians who blatantly lied to the electorate should go to jail
attributes.additional_details: BBC news; CNN; social media; GMB
attributes.background: It is being widely reported that politicians campaigning in the recent EU referendum have blatantly lied to the UK electorate and effectively misled them

rejection.details:
The Government and Parliament are not responsible for sending people to jail. This is a decision for the courts. There is no law which politicians have broken if they lied during the referendum campaign. If you want this to change, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/123348
